identifier.value: Energy Companies With More Than 10 Employees (Top 10K)

news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: Recurrent Energy has finalized significant financing deals to bolster its solar and energy storage projects. This includes closing a US$513 million financing for a Battery Energy Storage System (BESS) project in Arizona with a 20-year utility agreement, securing a €110 million finance facility for its global solar PV and energy storage pipeline, and obtaining a €674 million revolving credit facility to expand its European solar and BESS portfolio. Additionally, a €1.3 billion credit facility was secured to accelerate renewable energy development in Europe.

org_similarity_summary.insight_similar_orgs: Recurrent Energy, esVolta, TROES, Apex Clean Energy, and Pivot Energy operate in the renewable energy sector. Recurrent Energy focuses on solar and energy storage projects, while esVolta and TROES specialize in energy storage technologies and solutions. Apex Clean Energy and Pivot Energy are involved in developing and managing commercial-scale wind and solar energy facilities.

acquisition_identifier.value: Recurrent Energy acquired by Canadian Solar

overview_description.description: Recurrent Energy is a renewable energy company specializing in developing, constructing, and operating solar and energy storage projects.  They are a developer and owner of locally-sited solar power systems, selling clean electricity to their customers worldwide at competitive rates via a Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) or Feed-in Tariffs (FiT). In return, their utility, commercial, and government customers achieve energy independence, predictable pricing, and enhanced sustainability.

identifier.value: Michael Arndt President & General Manager @ Recurrent Energy
Michael Dennison Senior Director, Development - Central Region @ Recurrent Energy

properties.growth_insight_description: Recurrent Energy secured $513 million in financing for a 1,200 MWh energy storage project in Arizona. The company also obtained €1.3 billion in financing for its European project pipeline. Additionally, Recurrent Energy transferred $103 million in tax credits for a project in Oklahoma. Furthermore, BlackRock completed an initial investment in Recurrent Energy.

about_short_description.short_description: Recurrent Energy develops, constructs, and operates solar and energy storage projects.

product.name: Utility-scale Solar Project Development
product.description: Recurrent Energy develops large-scale solar projects that generate electricity for utilities and large power purchasers.

product.name: Utility-scale Energy Storage Project Development
product.description: The company develops large-scale energy storage projects to complement its solar projects or stand alone, enhancing grid reliability and flexibility.

product.name: Operations and Maintenance Services
product.description: Recurrent Energy offers operations and maintenance services for solar and energy storage projects, ensuring high performance and reliability.
